to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
strict/severe

sentences.english: That happened in the year 1636 when mania was reaching its peak.
sentences.chinese: 那一年是1636，鬱金香交易的投機性也變本加厲。

sentences.english: In recent years, Mugabe has grown even more ruthless.
sentences.chinese: 在最近的幾年中，穆加貝的殘暴愈加變本加厲。

sentences.english: To spank a crying child just adds fuel to the fire.
sentences.chinese: 打一個正在哭的孩子，只能使他變本加厲，哭得更兇。
